preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen existing or add new device from options in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.

mainSequence.step: Edge Agent 2 sends instructions for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations to Alice.
Alice adds agent with selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice views and shows the code to Edge Agent 2, who scans it.
Edge Agent 2 sends add request, along with keys and token data, to Edge Agent 1.
Edge Agent 1 stores the keys in the wallet and confirms Agent 2.
Edge Agent 1 syncs data to Agent 2.
Edge Agent 2 stores data in its wallet.
